name: exchain-analytics-adapter
description: Exchain Analytics Adapter - Prebid.js Build Compatible Module for Publisher Integration

scripts.install-instructions: echo "📋 Installation: Copy src/index.js to your Prebid.js modules/ directory and run: gulp build --modules=exchainAnalyticsAdapter"
scripts.copy-module: echo "ℹ️  Copy this file to your Prebid build: src/index.js -> modules/exchainAnalyticsAdapter.js"
scripts.prebid-build-help: echo "🔧 Build command: gulp build --modules=exchainAnalyticsAdapter,bidderA,bidderB (add your other modules)"
scripts.test: echo "✅ Module includes built-in error handling and console logging for debugging"

author: EXCHAIN PTE. LTD. <admin@exchain.co>
